metadata.title: CVE-2023-4132 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A use-after-free vulnerability was found in the siano smsusb module in theLinux kernel. The bug occurs during device initialization when the sianodevice is plugged in. This flaw allows a local user to crash the system,causing a denial of service condition.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
